title: BTS album total sales in South Korea 2013 to 2017
yAxis: Number of sold albums in thousand copies
summary: The statistic shows the sales South albums rate of the BTS Number sold from 2013 to 2017 .
The Number sold is expected to grow by 2723 thousand from 2014 to 2015 .
gold: The South Korean K-pop boyband BTS , also known as the Bangtan Boys sold around 2.7 million copies of their albums up until 2017.
The boyband is known as the biggest boyband in South Korea and has fans all over the globe.
The BTS phenomenon BTS , also known as ‘ Bangtan Boys ' ( or Bangtan Sonyeondan in Korean ) , formed in 2010 and had their debut in 2013 .
